call: /home/agalvezm/anaconda3/bin/kb count -i index.idx -g t2g.txt -x 10xv2 -o out/ --filter bustools fastqs/CRR126671_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126671_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126672_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126672_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126673_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126673_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126674_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126674_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126675_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126675_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126676_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126676_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126677_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126677_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126678_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126678_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126679_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126679_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126680_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126680_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126681_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126681_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126682_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126682_r2.fastq.gz
commands: kallisto bus -i index.idx -o out/ -x 10xv2 -t 8 fastqs/CRR126671_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126671_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126672_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126672_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126673_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126673_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126674_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126674_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126675_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126675_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126676_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126676_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126677_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126677_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126678_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126678_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126679_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126679_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126680_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126680_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126681_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126681_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126682_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126682_r2.fastq.gz
